EmailTemplate.name: 2015 Indices Increase.Email Message
EmailTemplate.subject: 2015 Indices Increase
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear MSP Customer:
This notification is to advise you that the 2015 indices increase for customers under an MSP contract will be 3.47%.
The rate escalation letters, which contain the specific rate values for your specific contract, will be available shortly on the MSP contracts/reporting website <https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/portal>.
Sincerely,
MSP Administration General Line 602-365-3099, option 2, option 4 Email: MSPContracts@honeywell.com <mailto:MSPContracts@honeywell.com>
